title: Finding /lim{x,0**+,1/x}
text: The values of $$\frac{1}{x}$$ increase without bound as $$x$$ approaches $$0$$ from the right. As such, we conclude that /lim{x,0**+,1/x}=+inf. The graph of $$f(x)=\frac{1}{x}$$ in the figure confirms these conclusions.\n##figure2.gif##
